sentences.en: Abortion has always been a divisive issue.
sentences.cn: 人工流产一直是个引发争议的问题。

sentences.en: Abstaining from lying , from divisive tale - bearing , from abusive speech , & from idle chatter.
sentences.cn: 因为远离虚诳语,远离离间语, 远离 粗 恶语, 远离杂秽语.

sentences.en: All these acts are divisive and therefore impermissible.
sentences.cn: 这些都是破坏团结的行为,是不能容许的.

sentences.en: All this can lead to divisive family arguments to which guilt is a major contributor.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都能导致家庭意见不和，而内疚是其中的主要因素。

sentences.en: But he was a divisive figure, not an epitome of Polish greatness.
sentences.cn: 但是,他虽曾是一位举足轻重的人物, 却不是波兰伟大的缩影.

sentences.en: Despite interest in his book, the territory's former governor remains a divisive figure.
sentences.cn: 尽管不少人对他的书感兴趣, 这位前香港总督仍然保持了制造不和谐气氛的形象.

sentences.en: Mr Blair is particularly controversial, but any high - profile European president would be a divisive figure.
sentences.cn: 虽然对于布莱尔的争议特别大, 但任何引人瞩目的欧洲领导人都会引发分歧.

sentences.en: No less significant an observer than William White called the speech nationally divisive.
sentences.cn: 像威廉这样的著名评论家都说,这篇演说在全国起了分裂作用.

sentences.en: That politician is a divisive influence at meetings.
sentences.cn: 那位政客在会议上总是起着分裂的作用.

sentences.en: The strike was a divisive issue in the community.
sentences.cn: 这场罢工导致社区内部分歧。

sentences.en: This is the very divisive process of thought.
sentences.cn: 这正是思想导致分裂的过程.
